question: Duchenne's muscular dvstrophy-
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., X-linked recessive o Duchenne and Becker's muscular dystrophy are X-like recessive, o So expression of gene is essentially confirmed in males. o Females are affected only if X-chromosome carrying the normal allele is lost or inactivated.
